<div id="map" style="height: 70vh;"></div>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.css"/>

<script>
const map = L.map('map').setView([31.5, 34.3], 7); // Levant-ish default
L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
  maxZoom: 14, attribution: '&copy; OpenStreetMap'
}).addTo(map);

fetch('data/latest/tracks_latest.geojson')
  .then(r => r.json())
  .then(geo => {
    const layer = L.geoJSON(geo, {
      style: { weight: 2 },
      pointToLayer: (f, latlng) => L.circleMarker(latlng, { radius: 3 })
    }).addTo(map);
    try { map.fitBounds(layer.getBounds(), { maxZoom: 10 }); } catch(e) {}
  })
  .catch(() => console.warn('No tracks yet'));
</script>

_Last updated: <span id="ts"></span>_
<script>document.getElementById('ts').textContent = new Date().toLocaleString();</script>
